div.a: Pioneer Valley Regional School District Will Remain Closed Until Monday, May 4th, 2020

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

a.title: Open Drive Folder, Public Meeting Notices

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

p.a: Recording of School Committee Meeting March 26th 2020

div.small: This is a partial recording due to technical difficulties, minutes will be posted as well once available
div.p: Future school committee meetings during the school closure due to COVID-19 will be streamed live to Bernardston Northfield Community Television's(BNCTV) Facebook page:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

a.strong: School Choice 20-21 is now Open: Deadline April 18th

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: To sign up to prepay for your child's meals at school, please go to payschoolscentral.com. When they ask for the special code, it is your child's student I.D. number.
You can add/manage your child's account right from this website.

div.p: The Pioneer Valley Regional School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, housing status, or disability in admission to, access to, employment in, or treatment in its programs and activities.
